evidence.pdf_reference: spectroscopy (EIS) were measured on an electrochemical workstation (CHI760E) using a standard three-electrode system, in which the Pt wire, the saturated calomel electrode and the photocatalyst were used as the counter electrode, the reference electrode and the working electrode, respectively.Photocatalytic reduction of CO 2 was performed in a quartz reactor with a volume of 200 mL.In a typical photocatalysis test, 50 mg catalyst was dispersed in 1 mL deionized water under sonication, and then transferred

Photocatalytic reduction of CO 2 into fuels is a promising approach to address the energy crisis and global warming issues.In this work, g-C 3 N 4 -W 18 O 49 nanocomposite material was constructed by a simple solvothermal method.The W 18 O 49 nanorods have a good dispersion by coupling with the g-C 3 N 4 sheet.Under simulated sunlight irradiation, the g-C 3 N 4 -W 18 O 49 nanocomposite exhibited superior photocatalytic CO 2 reduction capability than that of g-C 3 N 4 and W 18 O 49 .The photoelectrochemical
CEAULIGHT Beijing) equipped with FID detector.All the photocatalytic CO 2 reduction experiments were carried out at room temperature and atmospheric pressure.

performances of the as-prepared materials were evaluated through photocatalytic CO 2 reduction in the presence of H 2 O vapor under 300 W xenon lamp light irradiation.The photoreduction activity and the production rates of the materials are shown in Fig. 3a-3b.After irradiation for 4 h, it was found the CH 4 yield of the g-C 3 N 4 -W 18 O 49 nanocomposite was about 1.38 mol g -1 h -1 , which is higher than that of g-C 3 N 4 (0.17mol g -1 h -1 ) and W 18 O 49 (0.12 mol g - 1 h -1 ).And the CH 4 yield is

transfer path way could promote the separation and migration of photoinduced charge carriers.Accordingly, the photocatalytic CO 2 reduction into CH 4 and CO is enhanced due to the purification of more photogenerated electrons into the photoreduction process.
